snippet: The tenor Mark Padmore and the pianist Paul Lewis will open the series in October by performing the three Schubert song cycles: “Die schöne Müllerin,” “Schwanengesang,” and “Winterreise.”
abstract: The tenor Mark Padmore and the pianist Paul Lewis will open the series in October by performing the three Schubert song cycles: “Die schöne Müllerin,” “Schwanengesang,” and “Winterreise.”

headline.main: Lincoln Center to Open Great Performers Series With Schubert
headline.print_headline: Lincoln Center Sets Great Performers Lineup
